title: Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra; aizes from 32C to 50DD; ajustable straps in the front; 90% nylon, 10% spandex; everyday bra pack and 1 satin bra; leopard print and other colors (white, nude, and others)
descriptions:
Meet the Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack: full-coverage comfort with a dash of glam. Designed for curves and confidence, this wirefree plus-size bra set gives you everyday support and a sultry satin moment—featuring a chic leopard print alongside classic hues like white, nude, and more.

Why you’ll love it:
- Cloud-soft comfort, wirefree support: A wide, smoothing band and hook-and-eye closures deliver secure lift without the poke of wires.
- Flattering full coverage: Stay comfortably covered with a shaping fit that disappears under tees and blouses.
- Front-adjustable straps: Customize your fit in seconds—no twisting or reaching required.
- Luxe look, effortless feel: 90% nylon and 10% spandex blend for stretch, softness, and a sleek silhouette.
- Versatile pack: Includes an everyday bra and a satin bra so you can switch from daily wear to date-night glam.
- Style options: Leopard print to make a statement, plus timeless white, nude, and other colors to match your wardrobe.
- Size inclusive: Available from 32C to 50DD.

Slip into all-day ease with the support you deserve and the style you want. The Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack is your new top drawer essential—lift, comfort, and confidence in every wear.
